# Council of Infinite Innovators - VS Code Agent Template

This is a production-ready Visual Studio Code setup for building AI solutions backed by the Council of Infinite Innovators archetypes (Architect, Engineer, Strategist, etc.).

## Project Structure
- Multi-agent runtime with LangGraph-style state machine
- CLI + API for local and HTTP execution
- Dev Container for reproducible environments
- VS Code tasks for development workflow
- Testing harness with fixtures
- Prompt packs for each Council archetype
- 20-Phase framework roadmap scaffolds

## Development Guidelines
- Use proper typing and async/await patterns
- Follow the archetype-based prompt system
- Maintain security best practices with .env secrets
- Test agents with deterministic fixtures
- Keep prompts concise and actionable
